JournalID.description: The unique identifier of the journal entry.

JournalDate.description: The date of the journal entry.

JournalNumber.description: The journal number identifying the journal entry.

CreatedDateUTC.description: The date and time when the journal entry was created in UTC format.

Reference.description: A reference associated with the journal entry.

SourceID.description: The unique identifier of the source associated with this journal entry.

SourceType.description: The type of the source associated with this journal entry.

JournalLines.description: An array containing details of individual journal lines.

JournalLineID.description: The unique identifier of the journal line.

AccountType.description: The type of account for this journal line.

AccountID.description: The unique identifier of the account for this journal line.

AccountCode.description: The code of the account for this journal line.

TaxName.description: The name of the tax applied to this journal line.

TaxType.description: The type of tax applied to this journal line.

Description.description: A description of the journal line.

GrossAmount.description: The gross amount for this journal line.

NetAmount.description: The net amount for this journal line.

AccountName.description: The name of the account for this journal line.

TaxAmount.description: The tax amount for this journal line.

TrackingCategories.description: An array containing the tracking categories associated with this journal line.
